narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Alejandra Longoria is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Brownsville, TX. From 2023-05 through 2024-12, this provider received $202K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 622 beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.8× the national median for 92507 (92507), at $89 per claim vs. the median of $49, placing them above the 90th percentile.
99% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 92507 (92507). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Spending grew 28996% from $692 in 2023 to $201K in 2024.
Saw a 291.0× spike in 2024 ($692 → $201K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
